description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved drawing(s) and/or documents(s)) to allow:Mesh clad the ground floor with climbing plating aroundReplace the existing cement board clad of the old building with render similar to the new part of the buildAlign the windows of the old building with the new windows on the top floorsIntroduce soft landscaping with perimeter planters on the first-floor terrace with additional climbing plants on the metal meshInstallation of green roof on top floor to enhance biodiversity on siteInstallation of solar panels on the top roofof Full Planning Permission application reference 15/3407 dated 16/09/2015 for Refurbishment and extension of existing building to create 37 room hotel and cafe/restaurant (A3) and associated car parking and cycle storage.
